location.parking: Park on road by Strines Church - 30 second walk away

details.description: A welcoming playdate for dads, grandads, and male carers. Looking after kids can be a lonely job, so come meet other guys in the same situation, have a brew, and let the little ones play!

faq.a: Since Just 4 Dads @ St Chads is on holiday this week - we thought we'd host a low key event at our house.
This event is specifically for dads, grandads, uncles and male carers with their children to promote male-child bonding time.

faq.q: Will there be women organisers present?
faq.a: Yes, Jen will be helping host the event with Tim and James.

location.parking: Park on road by Strines Church - 30 second walk away

details.description: We're hosting a baby and toddler playdate at our house, and you're invited! All welcome - mums, dads, grandparents, aunts, uncles - anyone caring for little ones!

faq.a: We usually go to a playgroup at Inside Out in New Mills, but it's on holiday. We're keen to welcome everyone round for some festive playing at our house.
Yes, siblings are welcome! Our space and activities are best suited for ages 0-3, but we understand if you need to bring older children.
